response.summary: I have a civil engineering educational background, which led me to a tireless passion for pavements. My incessant desire for knowledge led me to conquer a master's degree in geotechnics based on pavements materials, thus consolidating my knowledge and appreciation for this field of engineering. Currently, I am immersed in the exciting journey of a PhD in Civil Engineering, where I seek to push the limits of innovation even further with a research on the fatigue behaviour of bituminous materials.
response.skills: Research, Civil Engineering, Pavements, Geotechnics, Project Planning

CIRCOPAV Project
Working on: Impact of climate change on fatigue service life of road pavements

profile_positions.title: Research Intern

profile_positions.description: Inter-administrative Contract, No ICCU – 501 of 2021 Signed between the Institute of Infrastructure and Concessions of Cundinamarca – ICCU and Universidad Nacional de Colombia. For the STUDY OF ALTERNATIVES FOR THE ACCESS ROAD BETWEEN THE URBAN AREA OF THE MUNICIPALITY OF VILLETA AND THE BAGAZAL POPULATION CENTER.
profile_positions.title: Resident Engineer and consulting support

profile_positions.description:
Inter-Administrative Contract, No. 1817 of 2020, between Universidad Nacional de Colombia and the National Institute of Roads (INVIAS), for the consultancy and technical studies necessary to carry out the review and adjustment of the toll traffic study by INVIAS.

Document and classify technically and administratively, the previous information available by the contractor under the Contract and for its development, as the primary input of the different specialties involved in the project. 

Collaborate with the direction and coordination of the project through the collection and initial analysis of secondary information that can be obtained from official sources that are required by the different specialties.

Support the monitoring and control of compliance with the consulting schedule and the commitments of the weekly technical and administrative meetings.

Support to the coordination and direction of the consultancy in the reception of correspondence and projection of deliverable documents.
profile_positions.title: Support civil engineer

profile_positions.description: Within the Institute of Urban Development, review of compliance with the technical specifications of materials used in conservation and maintenance works, in addition to the review of the audit quality plans and the different APUs not foreseen within the contracts. Developing its own methodology and oriented to the specific requirements of each order.
profile_positions.title: Internt
